description.value:
You can use your Channel Divinity to rebuke creatures who harm you. Immediately after a creature within 30 feet of you deals damage to you, you can use your reaction to force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes cold damage equal to the damage it just dealt, or half as much damage on a successful save. If the creature was an undead, it takes an additional 1d6 cold damage.

Additionally, you learn the find familiar spell and can cast it as a ritual. The spell doesnâ€™t count against your number of spells known. When you cast the spell, your familiar takes the form of a raven.
